conversations.dialog: Hey there, good to see a fresh face around here. I’m Andy, what do I call ya?
Well hope ya get settled in. I’m always around if ya feel the need for a drink of a hand of cards, got some fresh bread here, feel free to take some if ya get hungry.

choices.choice: How long have you been here?
responses: Just over a couple of weeks it’s a nice enough ride, not sure where we’re headed though and that driver kinda gives me the willies.

choices.choice: Have you met any of the other passengers?
responses: Yeah that Hunter aint got much class but she’s a hoot and a half i’ll tell ya that, got stories that’ll make any man squirm like a racoon in the wash.
The lil fellas a tad odd for my taste seems decent enough but i don’t trust him much. Always just sorta staring at ya like he’s seein right through ya?
